Package data.neighbors.hubness.experimental

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GaussianHubnessLocalizer
    This class implements an experiment for tracking hub localization in synthetic Gaussian intrinsically high-dimensional data, incrementally.
    HubnessRiskEstimatorFromARFF
    This class is meant to empirically estimate the distribution of the neighbor occurrence skewness in synthetic data of controlled dimensionality under standard metrics.
    HubnessRiskEstimatorFromGaussian
    This class is meant to empirically estimate the distribution of the neighbor occurrence skewness in synthetic data of controlled dimensionality under standard metrics.
    MultiGaussianLocalityExplorer
    This utility experimental script generates Gaussian mixture datasets of the specified dimensionality and calculates the correlations between norm and hubness/gb-hubness and density, where gb-hubness denotes the good-bad hubness ratio.
